string.text: Standard 30 round Thompson submachine gun magazine chambered in .45 acp. The Thompson is not a gun that many would expect to find in the zone, perhaps a gunsmith with peculiar tastes has been producing copies.

50-round Thompson magazine for the Thompson submachine gun. Normally the M1A1 pattern of Thompson possesses a different mag weld that does not accept drums, however, aftermarket modifications have made them compatible.
